summary: The boss of a publishing company is a womanizer and a jerk, but what would happen if he suddenly disappeared?
cast: René Lefèvre|Florelle|Jules Berry|Marcel Lévesque|Odette Talazac|Henri Guisol|Maurice Baquet|Jacques B. Brunius|Sylvain Itkine|Marcel Duhamel|Henri Saint-Isle|Pierre Huchet|René Génin|Max Morise|Charbonnier|Jean Dasté|Sylvia Bataille|Nadia Sibirskaïa|Edmond Beauchamp|Jean Bremaud|Margot Capelier|Guy Decomble|Paul Demange|Yves Deniaud|Germaine Duhamel|Paul Grimault|Claire Gérard|Michel Kovachevitch|Fabien Loris|Marcel Lupovici|Suzanne Magisson|Janine Tricotet
title: El crimen de Monsieur Lange
